document_data.mainbody: '''Slop Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Slop Street was located in the southwest section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]]. The road curved through much of the east and southeast parts of the ward, originating in the north at the end of [[Fishwife Alley]], curving east around the [[Waterdeep/Adventurers' Quarter|Adventurers' Quarter]], and eventually ending on the southern end of the [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]]. Other roads connecting with Slop Street included [[the Boomgarden]], [[Curtain Alley]], [[Dancing Court]], and [[Fillet Lane]].
document_data.Notable Locations: Several businesses were located on Slop Street. These included [[the Medusa's Glare]], [[Nueth's Fine Nets]], and the [[Temple of Good Cheer]].
